page.title: 14Lord's Meadow Cont.
page.content: In our square there is a football pitch, rugby club, football club, BMX track, Brownie hut and the tennis courts. In our square there are a lot of factories like Bristow the sweet factory. There is a place called Pauls making cattle feed. There are lots of factories to do with transport. FOOTBALL CLUB: C.U.A.F.C. Crediton United was formed after the 2nd World War. There were some teams before the war they were Crediton Town,Crediton Rangers, Jackson Centurians, Old Haywardians. There was a Crediton United before the 2nd WORLD WAR it was formed in 1910. Biggest Defeat:13:0 v Beacon Knights. Highest win:9:1.v Ladysmith Cubs. CHAIRMAN:MR.C.Gillard. CAPTAIN:Jimmy Pearn.
